source_id.docs:
**[ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)**: The sensor that should be mirrored.



*See also: [Copy Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/copy.html#id7)*

**[ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)**: The binary sensor that should be mirrored.



*See also: [Copy Binary Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/copy.html#configuration-variables)*

**[ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)**: The button that should be mirrored.



*See also: [Copy Button](https://esphome.io/components/copy.html#id1)*

**[ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)**: The cover that should be mirrored.



*See also: [Copy Cover](https://esphome.io/components/copy.html#id2)*

**[ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)**: The fan that should be mirrored.



*See also: [Copy Fan](https://esphome.io/components/copy.html#id3)*

**[ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)**: The lock that should be mirrored.



*See also: [Copy Lock](https://esphome.io/components/copy.html#id4)*

**[ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)**: The number that should be mirrored.



*See also: [Copy Number](https://esphome.io/components/copy.html#id5)*

**[ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)**: The select that should be mirrored.



*See also: [Copy Select](https://esphome.io/components/copy.html#id6)*

**[ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)**: The switch that should be mirrored.



*See also: [Copy Switch](https://esphome.io/components/copy.html#id8)*

**[ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)**: The text sensor that should be mirrored.



*See also: [Copy Text Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/copy.html#id9)*
